    main

Naive incidence

inci_naiv.Rd

Gives the naive estimation outputs for the whole data set

Usage

inci_naiv(data, array_inci, arm, topic, group)

Arguments

data

Historic and Current data

array_inci

The array setup for incidence proportions

arm

"Arm A" (treatment) or "Arm B" (control)

topic

Safety Topic

group

Comparison number

Value

Returns an array with naive incidence rates

On this page
